Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器目前离线。
> 飞船隐形传送系统运行正常。
> ^green;目前只有当前行星可以访问。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are currently offline.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;Currently only the planet below is accessible.

Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器上线。
> FTLFTL引擎上线。
> 飞船隐形传送系统运行正常。
> ^green;可以到达宇宙每个角落。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are online.
> FTL drive is online.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;The entire universe is accessible.

Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器上线。
> 飞船隐形传送系统运行正常。
> ^green;可以访问当前行星系统中的行星。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are online.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;Planets within this star system are accessible.

Texts.Chs: 目前没有任务坐标可用。

你是这艘船上唯一的注册船员。
可以招聘额外的船员来提高操作效率。
Texts.Eng:
You are the only registered crew member of this ship.
Recruiting additional crew members may allow for increased operational efficiency.
